name: Zoom (Lens Focal Length Change)
description: Changing lens focal length to magnify or widen view without moving camera

prompt.base: Zoom camera effect, changing focal length, zoom in or zoom out, lens magnification, optical zoom, telephoto to wide or wide to telephoto, focal length adjustment, zoom lens effect
prompt.positive: zoom effect, focal length change, zoom in, zoom out, lens magnification, optical zoom, telephoto effect, wide angle effect, focal adjustment, zoom lens, magnification change
prompt.negative: dolly movement, camera position change, physical camera movement, static focal length, fixed lens

technical.movement_type: Optical - focal length change, no camera position change
technical.speed: Variable - slow for dramatic, fast for shock
technical.use_cases: Dramatic emphasis, shock moments, quick reframing, stylistic choice

examples: Zoom in on character's shocked expression, rapid focal length change for dramatic emphasis
Slow zoom out revealing the full scene, gradual widening of perspective
